name: Minimalistic Notion Dashboard
description: Adapted from the default Life Wiki Notion template, this minimalistic template includes everything you need to organise your life with Notion.Duplicate for free by putting 0 in the price box, or tip an amount of your choice.Let me know what other templates you'd like me to make.
